name: Gravity Stars
description:
Gravity Stars is a platformer focused on speed and momentum. Whizz through the scenery and navigate more trickier areas. Also features potatoes.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement
Space: Jump/Attack

For level select: Press Esc to pause the game, tap "Return to Title", and on the title "Level Select"

The downloadable version is recommended for better music / framerate / load times
